item.title: Canteen Ordering System
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Developed a full-stack web application to allow students to place online orders from canteen stalls, improving convenience and reducing wait times. Features include: • Admin CMS • Login / Registration • Add to cart • Checkout • Payment • Delete • Update • Quantity • Order Status (To Pay / Preparing / Ready to Pick Up / Completed)
item.content:encoded:
Developed a full-stack web application to allow students to place online orders from canteen stalls, improving convenience and reducing wait times.

Features include:
• Admin CMS • Login / Registration • Add to cart • Checkout • Payment • Delete • Update • Quantity • Order Status (To Pay / Preparing / Ready to Pick Up / Completed)

item.title: PiratePath AR App & Landing Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: PiratePath is an android-based augmented reality (AR) application designed to provide seamless indoor navigation within a university campus. The app eliminates the need for GPS by relying on AR technology and visual markers to guide users to their destinations. PiratePath features a user-friendly interface and a virtual tour guide that dynamically assists users during navigation, ensuring an engaging and efficient experience.
item.content:encoded: PiratePath is an android-based augmented reality (AR) application designed to provide seamless indoor navigation within a university campus. The app eliminates the need for GPS by relying on AR technology and visual markers to guide users to their destinations. PiratePath features a user-friendly interface and a virtual tour guide that dynamically assists users during navigation, ensuring an engaging and efficient experience.
